# Min Int16

> Minimum signed 16-bit integer.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var INT16_MIN = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/int16-min' );
```

#### INT16_MIN

Minimum signed 16-bit integer.

```javascript
var bool = ( INT16_MIN === -32768 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

```javascript
var INT16_MIN = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/int16-min' );

console.log( INT16_MIN );
// => -32768
```
